page.title: 14Thorpe in Balne Craft Centre
page.content: The Craft Centre at{Thorpe in Balne is big.In a corner is a table with leather work on it.The leather workman has made the things that are on display on the table.There are bookmarks, wallets, purses, penknife holders and lots more.Next to the leather table is a long shelf with things made of herbs like lavender bags and some things to make a headache go away using cooked herbs. On the other side of the herb shelf are little ornaments made of shells and stones that are painted.As you go upstairs there is a pair of horns.On the top floor there are a lot of things to buy.Most of them were cuddly toys and some of them were for sale.Next to the toys was a table covered with knitted clothes.
